reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 272/19: OBJECTS OF THE OFFICE
reg_info.act_under: Education Quality and Accountability Office Act, 1996

content.content: 1. The Office has the following objects in addition to those set out in section 3 of the Act: 1. To develop examinations relating to proficiency in mathematics for the purposes of clause 18 (1) (c) of the Ontario College of Teachers Act, 1996 and to mark completed examinations. 2. To conduct research and collect information in order to assess the ability and confidence of individuals writing the examinations referred to in paragraph 1.
content.raw_html:
1. The Office has the following objects in addition to those set out in section 3 of the Act:

1. To develop examinations relating to proficiency in mathematics for the purposes of clause 18 (1) (c) of the Ontario College of Teachers Act, 1996 and to mark completed examinations.

2. To conduct research and collect information in order to assess the ability and confidence of individuals writing the examinations referred to in paragraph 1.

content.content: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
content.raw_html: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
